title: Their Little Girl
description: Their Little GirlThe last eight months of Erica's life haven't been easy. She's been struggling to keep her grades up and dealing with the fact that her mother abandoned her, leaving her all alone with two gorgeous men.The last thing Erica wants is to be a burden on either of them, so she keeps up with her studies, and does her best to make sure their home is clean and tidy.Now that it's time for Erica's high school graduation, the men in her life have planned a graduation gift for Erica, a very special reward she will never forget – the chance to be with them both. At the same time. "Their Little Girl" is over 50 pages of heart pounding, sexy menage that's sure to leave you panting for more.Warning – contains erotic sex scenes (M/F/M) 18+ Adult eyes only
author: L.J. Anderson
